no_root: Kāore tēnei kaupapa e whakaratoia ai hei root!
use_sudo: Whakamahia a sudo ina hiahiatia ai.
checking_internet: E tirotiro ana i te hononga ipurangi...
internet_error: Hē: Kāore he hononga ipurangi i kitea!
timeshift_missing: Kāore a Timeshift i whakauru. Kāore he snapshot i hangaia.
creating_snapshot: E hanga ana i te snapshot me Timeshift...
snapshot_failed: Whakatūpato: I raru te hanga snapshot
update_packages: E whakahōu ana i ngā raina kōpaki...
update_error: He hē i te whakahōu i ngā raina kōpaki
check_packages: He hē i te tirotiro i ngā kōpaki
packages_count: Te maha o ngā kōpaki hei whakahōu: %d
packages_list: Raina o ngā kōpaki hei whakahōu:
installing_updates: E whakauru ana i ngā whakahōu...
install_error: He hē i te whakauru i ngā whakahōu kōpaki
dist_upgrade: E tirotiro ana i ngā whakahōu tōpana...
dist_error: Whakatūpato: He hē i roto i te dist-upgrade
removing_obsolete: E whakakahoretia ana ngā kōpaki tawhito...
autoremove_error: Whakatūpato: He hē i roto i te autoremove
cleaning_cache: E horoia ana te kōpaki cache...
autoclean_error: Whakatūpato: He hē i roto i te autoclean
updating_snap: E whakahōu ana i ngā kōpaki Snap...
snap_error: He hē i te whakahōu i ngā kōpaki Snap
updating_flatpak: E whakahōu ana i ngā kōpaki Flatpak...
flatpak_error: He hē i te whakahōu i ngā kōpaki Flatpak
no_reboot: Kāore he reboot e hiahiatia ana
reboot_message: Me reboot kia oti ai ngā whakahōu.
reboot_prompt: E hiahia ana koe ki te reboot ināianei? (y/N):
reboot_later: Kaua e wareware ki te reboot a muri ake nei!
help_description: uubu - Taputapu whakahōu aunoa mō Ubuntu/Kubuntu
help_desc_long:
Ko te uubu (Update Upgrade Ubuntu) he mea whakaahua i ngā whakahōu pūnaha katoa.
E whakahōu ana i te APT, Snap, Flatpak, e horoi ana i te pūnaha ā mā te reboot hoki mēnā me.
flag_snapshot: Hangaia he snapshot Timeshift i mua o te whakahōu
flag_no_snap: Kaua e whakahōu ngā kōpaki Snap
flag_no_flatpak: Kaua e whakahōu ngā kōpaki Flatpak
flag_no_reboot: Kaua e pātai mō te reboot
flag_dist_upgrade: Mahi whakapaipai katoa o te pūnaha (uru ai hoki te tango kōpaki tawhito)
